@rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum ,cmt.cidx as cidx ,cmt.midx as midx ,cmt.bidx as bidx ,cmt.aidx as aidx ,cmt.mnickname as mnickname ,cmt.content as content ,cmt.picsrc as picsrc ,cmt.regdate as regdate ,cmt.status as status ,gm.profilesrc as mProfileSrc from comments cmt inner join general_members gm,(select @rownum:=0) rn where cmt.midx = gm.midx and cmt.aidx=#{aIdx} and cmt.bidx=#{bIdx} order by cidx) list where rownum>=#{start} and rownum <=#{end}
